title: LEFT CLICK BROKEN - any suggestions?
body: All my in game settings got reset after the patch before the preseason update. I was able to change everything except left click. Left click completely doesn't work, unless I am in a menu such as the settings or shop. I have spent hours trying to resolve this issue without any progress. I have since then been leveling up a secondary account I created a while back which has worked perfectly fine with no issues. I realize riot acknowledged the issue, however it has been about a week and my account is completely unplayable. Does anybody know any fixes? Any suggestions are greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
There was an issue last week that caused settings to reset or config files to mess up for some players.  If you're having an issue still as a result, your best bet would be to manually reset your config:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Hope that helps your main!

Thanks, haven't tried that yet. I'll go give it a try. Can't wait to check out the champion reworks!

Edit: Worked perfectly, thanks so much.
